ygData.subject: Re: Polished Granite Tomahawk
ygData.msgSnippet: Hmm try this time 3 to 4am.  I live in Japan and when I get home from work Monday night and I login to EQ its aprox 4am or 4:30am Monday morning in the USA
ygData.messageBody:
Hmm try this time 3 to 4am. I live in Japan and when I get home from work
Monday night and I login to EQ its aprox 4am or 4:30am Monday morning in the
USA (PST). Number of people on my server is aprox 250 to 350. The whole
place is dead. I went to najena to kill some TT and me and my partner (who
lives in Denmark) were the only ones in there. Two people! unbelievable.
About an hour later one other lower level person showed up.

I bet that the Tomahawk will be camped very lightly (I wont go so far to say
it WONT be camped at all). The only people who may be camping it will most
likely be Japanese or MAYBE some Europeans (thou in Europe it will be aprox.
early afternoon, like 1pm or so).

If there Japanese you wont have any sharing problems, but please EXPLAIN to
them you want to share the spawn. For some reason (until you explain the
idea to them, and it helps if you speak Japanese) the concept of kill
stealing and alternating kills doesn't occur to them. No idea why.

In my experience when its explained to them they never do it again.

Well hope that helps, maybe. Good luck getting the Tomi.

> ----------
> From: Nick Morgowicz[SMTP:nomorgow@...]
> Reply To: warriors_eq@onelist.com
> Sent: Tuesday, May 25, 1999 1:15 AM
> To: warriors_eq@onelist.com
> Subject: [warriors_eq] Polished Granite Tomahawk
>
> From: Nick Morgowicz <nomorgow@...>
>
> This seems to be the most camped weapon that i've ever seen. No matter
> what time i goto Highpass, there's always at least one group just sitting
> there waiting for endless hours for the gnoll to spawn.
>
>
